channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Video Embed
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Video Embed

item.title: CVE-2021-24337|2024-08-03T19:28:23.427Z -- unknown -- video%20embed
item.description: The id GET parameter of one of the Video Embed WordPress plugin through 1.0's page (available via forced browsing) is not sanitised, validated or escaped before being used in a SQL statement, allowing low privilege users, such as subscribers, to perform SQL injection.
